Class Slicer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Slicer

  • public class Slicer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Slicer(<any> facets, float layerHeight, float infill, float filamentDiameter, float nozzleDiameter)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <any> createGCode(<any> layers, int extTemp, int bedTemp, PVector modelOffset)
      Gets the RepRap GCode that can be used to print the 3D model This method uses the information in layers to create RepRap GCode commands that can be sent to a compatable 3D printer in order to print the 3D model represented by the given layers.
      Layer sliceLayer(float zPos)
      Slices the given layer This method determines the facets that intersect the plane at the given z-height, creates lines between the two intersections of each facet, and places them into a Layer object which is returned
      <any> sliceLayers()
      Slices the 3D model to a printable representation at intervals that match layerHeight This method completely slices the 3D model given at object creation to its printable representation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Slicer

        public Slicer(<any> facets,
              float layerHeight,
              float infill,
              float filamentDiameter,
              float nozzleDiameter)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        facets - A representation of the facets that make up the 3D model
        layerHeight - The desired z-height of each layer in the sliced object. Must be > 0.0, otherwise, it is set to 1.5
        infill - Percentage of the inside part of the object that should be filled with material. Should be between 0 and 1

    • Method Detail

      • sliceLayers

        public <any> sliceLayers()
        Slices the 3D model to a printable representation at intervals that match layerHeight This method completely slices the 3D model given at object creation to its printable representation. This includes determining the intersections of the 3D model, adding walls, adding infill, and determining necessary travels for each layer.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the layers that make up the printable representation of the 3D model.

      • createGCode

        public <any> createGCode(<any> layers,
                         int extTemp,
                         int bedTemp,
                         PVector modelOffset)
        Gets the RepRap GCode that can be used to print the 3D model This method uses the information in layers to create RepRap GCode commands that can be sent to a compatable 3D printer in order to print the 3D model represented by the given layers.
        Parameters:
        layers - An ArrayList of layers to be printed
        extTemp - Int representing temperature to set extruder to
        bedTemp - Int representing temperature to set bed to
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of RepRap GCode commands ready to be sent to a printer

      • sliceLayer

        public Layer sliceLayer(float zPos)
        Slices the given layer This method determines the facets that intersect the plane at the given z-height, creates lines between the two intersections of each facet, and places them into a Layer object which is returned
        Parameters:
        ZPos - The height of the layer to slice
        Returns:
        A Layer object that represents the 2-dimensional intersections of the model at the given height.
